effects.display_string: Set: Shield of the Righteous deals 10% increased damage and grants 3% damage reduction.
(4) Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
(4) Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 318 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

Use: Gain 4 stacks of Platinum Plating for 30 sec, increasing your Armor by 9,568. Receiving more than 10% of your health from a Physical damage effect will remove one stack of Platinum Plating. (2 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of Silvermoon City.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
